original_text: Now there was a day when the sons of God came to present themselves before the Lord, and Satan came also among them.
korean_text: 하루는 하나님의 아들들이 와서 여호와 앞에 섰고 사탄도 그들 가운데에 온지라

sentences.original_text: when the sons of God came to present themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 아들이들이 자신을 드러내기 위해 왔을 때

sentences.original_text: and Satan came also among them
